text:
Indica Labs | http://www.indicalab.com/#section-careers | Web Developer, Software Engineer, Image Analyst, Algorithm Engineer | Albuquerque, NM | ONSITE

Indica Labs provides software solutions for fast, quantitative evaluation of pathology images using HALO, our flagship image analysis platform. Pharmaceutical, healthcare, and research organizations worldwide have adopted HALO for high-throughput, whole-slide image quantification in areas such as neuroscience, ophthalmology, metabolism, oncology, respiratory, and toxicological pathology.

We are growing and have a number of open positions:

* Full-Stack Web Developer (React, Nodejs, AWS)

* Software Engineer (C++, C#, GRPC)

* Image Analyst (histology, digital pathology, and image analysis)

* Algorithm Engineer (C++, neural nets)

To apply, contact me (Scott) at slewis@indicalab.com
